sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import netflix from "../netflix.svg"; import { PlayIcon } from "@heroicons/react/outline"; import CustomButton from "../CustomButton"; import Icon from '../Icon.png'; const ApplyNowButtonCard = ({ Height, Width, FontSize, FontWeight, ButtonText, JobTitle, FontStyle, CompanyName, Font16, Industry, RemoteType, Location, JobType, MinimumExperience, MaximumExperience, MinimumSalary, MaximumSalary, MinNumberOfEmployee, MaxNumberOfEmployee, ButtonVariant, GreyColor }) => { return (
{JobTitle}
{CompanyName} - {Industry}
{Location}({RemoteType})
{JobType}
Experience({MinimumExperience} - {MaximumExperience}years)
INR()({MinimumSalary} - {MaximumSalary} / Month)
{MinNumberOfEmployee} - {MaxNumberOfEmployee} employees
{/* */}
{ButtonText}
); }; export default ApplyNowButtonCard;
